properties.resident quotes: Hui Geng - Hui volunteers and lives in the Lotherton community with her family. She began volunteering about 5 years ago when she moved to the neighbourhood. After joining a resident outreach group, Hui now attends regular meetings, plans events, and sits on the RAG panel meetings.

Joel Persaud - Joel was born and raised in the Lotherton community, in addition to working and volunteering there. He started as a volunteer around 2007, where he filmed a home-made music video in the community. When the Lotherton ANC recognized his achievements, Joel began to lead a group of youth in the neighbourhood and they were able to create a studio in the ANC office.

Lisa Noble - Lisa works for the City of Toronto with Lawrence Square Employment and Social Services. She attends meetings with ANC to find ways to serve the clients that receive benefits in the Lotherton Pathway area and to stay connected with the neighbourhood they serve.
